output.sentences: The team from NASA has arrived.
They are studying a giant crater which they think has been here for hundreds of years.
Collecting rock and soil samples is a vital part of their research.
Video images and measurements are taken with advanced equipment.
Dr. Banes, the head researcher, rests and admires the landscape of our beautiful planet.
